ExpandtestingPracticeWebsitePage.description: This page serves as a practice website for automation testing, providing various elements and scenarios for testing different automation tools and techniques.

elements.name: Search Input
elements.description: Input field to search for specific examples or topics on the website.

elements.name: Search Button
elements.description: Button to initiate the search based on the entered text in the search input field.

elements.name: Test Cases Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the Test Cases section of the website.

elements.name: API Testing Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the API Testing section of the website.

elements.name: XPath / CSS Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the XPath/CSS section of the website.

assertions: Page contains the header 'Automation Testing Practice WebSite for QA and Developers'
The search input field is present and visible
The 'Test Cases' button is present and visible

WebInputsPageForAutomationTestingPractic.description: This page is designed to practice web input automation. It contains various input fields and buttons for testing purposes.

elements.name: Display Inputs Button
elements.description: Button to display the entered inputs.

elements.name: Clear Inputs Button
elements.description: Button to clear the input fields.

elements.name: Web inputs page for Automation Testing Practice Header
elements.primary_locator: text=Web inputs page for Automation Testing Practice

assertions: Page title contains 'Web inputs page for Automation Testing Practice'
The main header 'Web inputs page for Automation Testing Practice' is displayed

WebInputsPagePage.description: This page is designed to allow users to input data into various fields and interact with web elements, providing a practice environment for automation testing.

elements.name: Number Input Field
elements.description: Input field for entering numeric data.

elements.name: Text Input Field
elements.description: Input field for entering text data.

elements.name: Display Inputs Button
elements.description: Button to display the entered inputs.

elements.name: Clear Inputs Button
elements.description: Button to clear the entered inputs.

assertions: Page heading contains 'Web inputs page for Automation Testing Practice'
